name: Space Warrior (CP Verlag)
overview: Published in Magic Disk 64 1988/10, Digital Marketing PD #082. A horizontally scrolling space shooter. Much like a poor man's Delta. It goes on forever. Unfortunately, after the great and last intergalactic battle, which ended with no clear winner and only losers, the universe fell into a chaotic and terrifying situation. In fact, gangs of outlaws and the possessed roam through the air and underground spaces where they sow panic and terror, plundering defenseless citizens and taking wealth and goods that could have been in the marketplace. They were created, in the past, to defend themselves form these evil surveillance teams that flew over the planet. Take them out and as you progress through your career you will get improvements for your ship which will make things a bit easier. When you have defeated all the enemies you will be crowned as Space Warrior!
